review: Namrata has aptly called herself The Smylist, cause you'll always end up leaving her clinic with a smile on your face, however ugly your teeth are. She is extremely hands on and takes utmost care of her patients. She is meticulous and pays a lot of attention to detail. For the first time in my life, I can't wait to come back and visit my dentist.

Loved the clinic and how they really explain dental health-the entire team made me so comfortable and did a brilliant job with my teeth. They took precautions at every level and informed me of everything they did-am going to be regularly coming here and making sure my dental health is up to the mark.
Painless dental experience. Appreciate how the doctor is very informative about procedures. Would recommend to all.
Absolutely fantastic. *** ***** *** ***, makes the patient feel comfortable and is good at what she does. Highly recommend.
Had a very comfortable experience. Very happy with the work done and the clinic is really made well. Would definitely be coming back for any other dental work.
Had a fantastic experience. Changed my smile completely. Dr. Namrat explains the treatment very well and listens to you patiently. If you want a great smile, I would surely tell you to visit her!
Very good work. I was explained the treatment well and was painless as promised. Polite staff, clean and beautiful clinic. Highly recommend
Excellent dentist, lovely person. Highly recommended and very conveniently located in Bandra West.
